tool_description: Find email of anyone from their first name, last name, and domain.

api_list.name: Fetch email of a person
api_list.description: Retrieve the email address of an individual based on their first name, last name, and domain. This API is particularly useful for lead generation, prospecting, and cold marketing.

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: The first name of the person whose email is being searched.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: The last name of the person whose email is being searched.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The domain of the email provider (e.g., google.com).
